alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 6:33PM PDT until August 24 at 10:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern San Bernardino County in California. * WHEN...Until 930 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 633 PM PDT, CHP reported water over roadways in Twentynine Palms near Sando Road and Meldora Avenue due to heavy rain that has since ended. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Twentynine Palms, nearby sections of SR62 and secondary roads - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
